title: Washer and Dryer Connections, Resort-style Swimming Pool
map_address: 115 Stone Mountain Road near Weir Rd.
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1529 Sq.
Welcome home to Rivers Edge Rental Homes.
Surrounded by mature landscaping and breathtaking views of Georgetown, Texas.
Located above the famous San Gabriel river which can be used for water activities such as canoeing, kayaking, or paddleboarding.

Our rental homes in Georgetown for rent are just a quick drive from Highway 130, and Interstate Highway 35, you will be able to enjoy the convenience of being so close to Wolf Ranch Shopping Center, restaurants, entertainment, and schools.
Making us the perfect location for any lifestyle.
We offer three floor plans for you to choose from, with three and four bedroom rental homes in Georgetown, TX as well as townhomes.
Each of our stunning rental homes features hardwood flooring, central air and heating, walk-in closets, front and back yards, and spacious 2 car attached garages.
Enjoy cooking in your new kitchen with stainless steel whirlwind energy-efficient appliances and slate grey quartz countertops.
Our kitchens also include trendy grey cabinetry with interchangeable shelves and subway tile backsplash.
So, you can monitor your thermostat from anywhere in the world, Smart Honeywell thermostats come standard in all rental homes.
Designed with your comfort and convenience in mind.

LED Lighting, 2 Car Attached Garage, 2-inch Faux Wood Blinds, Stand-up Showers, Wood Flooring, Irrigation Water Sensors*, Slate Grey Quartz Countertops*, Trendy Grey Cabinetry*, Stand Alone Homes, Subway Tile Backsplash*, Smart Thermostats, Washer and Dryer Connections, Front Yard and Fenced Back Yards, Gas Range*

Hassle Free Lawncare, On-site Professional Management, Park and Picnic Areas with Barbecue Grills, Fitness Center, On-site Professional Maintenance, Resort-style Swimming Pool, Amenity Center and Clubhouse with Wi-Fi, Dog Park
